post:
Hello!

SetraHost is a reliable webhosting solution that strives to provide hosting services that will blow your mind, but not not the money in your wallet.
We are faster, more reliable and and affordable than most in the market, starting at only $10 per year and continuing to hold a 100% uptime (which can be seen on our public uptime page).

We know you’ll love our services, but if at any chance you don’t, we do provide a 30 day money back guarantee.
Your happiness is our first priority.

We have a promotion code just for you! Use 20OFF for 20% your first bill (for yearly plans, this is 20% off your entire first year).

WE HAVE THE BEST HOSTING PLAN FOR YOU!
Our monthly plans are billed monthly. Our yearly plans give you 12 months of web hosting service.

We also have Managed WordPress plans, as can be seen here.

About us and our mission:
We began working in the hosting industry in 2005 as a hobby, but it became so much more.
We continue to have genuine love for what we do and constantly strive to deliver quality services for a price that you can afford.

Our goal is to make it so you can completely focus on your website and not constantly worry about your host being down or always having issues. Don't worry though because if you do need assistance, we put extensive focus on Customer Support and are always here to help. Even in the middle of the night.

We are a small company who doesn't see our customers as just a number, this is a little family and we're excited to have you a part of it!

Why should you choose SetraHost?
SetraHost brings you the fastest webhosting services for the most affordable prices in the webhosting industry today. SetraHost uses top of the line technology consisting of ultra powerful Intel E5 powerhouse servers along with blazing fast Samsung Enterprise Solid State Drives on a full RAID10 setup. SetraHost uses LiteSpeed Enterprise Webserver along with LiteSpeed Cache bringing you blazing fast loading speeds*perfectly optimized for WordPress Blogs*and more! SetraHost's premium optimization brings you a 3000% increase in perfomance.*New to making websites and shared webhosting?*Don't worry, we make it really easy with the award winning cPanel Control Panel, allowing you to completely manage your website, emails, MySql databases and more via our user-friendly cPanel Control Panel. We provide a 1-Click App Installer that allows you to*easily install WordPress, Joomla, Drupal, Magento and hundreds more!*With the best prices and webhosting services, we are the perfect hosting solution for you.*Moving from a different webhost?*No problem at all! We will migrate your website to us for absolutely free! Not to mention, our customer support team is here for you along the way, even in the middle of the night.

What some of our customers have to say:
Beyond happy with Setrahost!

This is probably going to sound like a paid review but it isn't. I used to use Hostgator and after having my website go down for 4 hours I posted on Twitter asking for help switching to a different host.

Setrahost reached out to me within 15 minutes and offered help without even pitching me on their service. They simply answered my question and told me how to change hosts.

After looking into them more I reached out to them on Twitter again and switched to them. Since then I have been nothing but happy! My site responds faster than it ever did, it has yet to go down for even a minute, and I pay 1/10 of what I did with Hostgator.

Would definitely recommend to anyone. 5/5 stars well earned
Click to expand...
- Ryan O'Donoghue

I just switched my hosting to SetraHost and it's been a very good experience so far. A+ customer service, and their plans fit all my needs. I recommend.
Click to expand...
- Chris Waycaster



Any questions? Feel free to head over to our website at SetraHost.com and talk to a sales rep today! We are here for you every step of the way!

Thank you for taking your time to check us out and we look forward to welcoming you to the Setra family!
